title.native: 映画 オッドタクシー イン・ザ・ウッズ

description: Note: This is a reconstruction of the television anime that will also depict what happens after its finale with a new story written by Kazuya Konomoto.

tags.name: Crime
tags.description: Centers around unlawful activities punishable by the state or other authority.

tags.name: Anthropomorphism
tags.description: Contains non-human character(s) that have attributes or characteristics of a human being.

tags.name: Tragedy
tags.description: Centers around tragic events and unhappy endings.

tags.name: Mafia
tags.description: Centered around Italian organised crime syndicates.

tags.name: Animals
tags.description: Prominently features animal characters in a leading role.

tags.name: Urban
tags.description: Partly or completely set in a city.

tags.name: Work
tags.description: Centers around the activities of a certain occupation.

tags.name: Yakuza
tags.description: Centered around Japanese organised crime syndicates.

tags.name: Cars
tags.description: Centers around the use of automotive vehicles.

tags.name: Male Protagonist
tags.description: Main character is male.

tags.name: Primarily Adult Cast
tags.description: Main cast is mostly composed of characters above a high school age.

tags.name: Primarily Animal Cast
tags.description: Main cast is mostly composed animal or animal-like characters.

tags.name: Ensemble Cast
tags.description: Features a large cast of characters with (almost) equal screen time and importance to the plot.

tags.name: Revenge
tags.description: Prominently features a character who aims to exact punishment in a resentful or vindictive manner.

tags.name: Philosophy
tags.description: Relating or devoted to the study of the fundamental nature of knowledge, reality, and existence.

tags.name: Adoption
tags.description: Features a character who has been adopted by someone who is neither of their biological parents.

tags.name: Anti-Hero
tags.description: Features a protagonist who lacks conventional heroic attributes and may be considered a borderline villain.

tags.name: Police
tags.description: Centers around the life and activities of law enforcement officers.

tags.name: Idol
tags.description: Centers around the life and activities of an idol.

tags.name: Twins
tags.description: Prominently features two or more siblings that were born at one birth.

tags.name: Hip-hop Music
tags.description: Centers on the musical style of hip-hop, not to be applied to anime that use hip-hop in its soundtrack.

tags.name: Bullying
tags.description: Prominently features the use of force for intimidation, often in a school setting.

tags.name: Bar
tags.description: Partly or completely set in a bar.

tags.name: Heterosexual
tags.description: Prominently features a romance between a man and a woman, not inherently sexual.

tags.name: Age Gap
tags.description: Prominently features romantic relations between people with a significant age difference.

tags.name: Martial Arts
tags.description: Centers around the use of traditional hand-to-hand combat.

tags.name: Video Games
tags.description: Centers around characters playing video games.

tags.name: Suicide
tags.description: The act or an instance of taking or attempting to take one's own life voluntarily and intentionally.

node.description:
[Twitter](https://twitter.com/kazuyakonomoto) | [Website](http://kazuyakonomoto.web.fc2.com/) | [Wiki (jp)](https://ja.wikipedia.org/wiki/此元和津也) | [Official P.I.C.S Website Info](https://www.pics.tokyo/member/kazuya-konomoto/)

In 2010, Kazuya Kanomoto started working as a manga artist with the manga "Spinnerbait". In 2013, his one-shot "Majigumo wa Zettai Ame" gained popularity, and started serialization under the new name of "Setoutsumi". In 2014, he was nominated for the "18th Tezuka Osamu Cultural Award - Reader's Award" along with famous works such as "Deaf Kata", "Yowamushi Pedal", and "Boku Dake Ga Inai Machi". The story, which unfolds in the same place, with only the same two people talking, has since been made into a movie and a drama, and has become a big hit. 

In 2019, he started full-scale activities as a screenwriter with movies, dramas, and Hulu original stories. Currently, he is making use of his unique authorship to expand his activities into areas other than manga. He also participates in P.I.C.S. management since 2018.

[Website](https://www.pics.tokyo/member/baku-kinoshita/) | [Twitter](https://twitter.com/mugicaan1) | [Instagram](https://www.instagram.com/mugicaan/)

An animator and character designer currently working at animation studio P.I.C.S.

[Website](https://www.pics.tokyo/member/baku-kinoshita/) | [Twitter](https://twitter.com/mugicaan1) | [Instagram](https://www.instagram.com/mugicaan/)

An animator and character designer currently working at animation studio P.I.C.S.
